1.content: Welcome to a world where a lone diaper witch and their only caretaker are in charge of the world (of course no one is aware they are) to get things started would you like to be a boy or girl?
1.title: Who are you?

11.content: Your a handsome young man with a nice face and well-toned body, now we got the important question, do you wanna be the diaper witch or the caretaker, remember this choice cant he changed later on.
11.title: So your a boy.

111.content: You have had magic powers ever since you were born, however, it only seemed to be while you wore a diaper and when using it you could cast spells on anyone, no one was really sure how you could do it nor did they know as you also seemed to enjoy the soft padding around your butt. Today, however, you made a choice to go on your own, leaving your mom and dad behind you as you get a nice house and even a servant to change your diapers and love you like a parent would a child. Now is your caretaker a Male or female?
111.title: Male diaper witch

112.content:
So you signed your life away to a young witch without thinking about it, so what if they wore diapers and you were to change them whenever needed. You would live forever as a young 26-year-old man on the first day of the rest of your life. Things couldn't be that had right?

Is the diaper witch Male or female?
112.title: Male Care taker

12.content: Your an adorable young lady and everyone around you thinks your the cutest thing in the world. Now the important question that might change all of that, are you the caretaker or the diaper witch?
12.title: So your a girl?

121.content:
So you're a female caretaker of a diaper witch, that wouldn't be so bad, right? You were given eternal life and youth as a 26-year-old in exchange for serving a young diaper witch for the rest of your life or until the witch decided to let you go.

Now is your diaper witch a Male or female?
121.title: Female care taker

122.content:
You're a young witch, though instead of a magic wand your powers came from diapers, however, that didn't seem so wrong. You had the power to control the world with a simple bowel movement. Now, however, you were on your own, a nice place to live and a servant to change you on command. What could be better?

Now is your caretaker male or female?
122.title: Female Diaper witch

info.brief_description: Your a diaper witch, or the care taker of a diaper witch.
info.description:
You're a diaper witch or the caretaker of one. If your the witch your life will be about controlling the world around you and being in charge. If you chose to be the caretaker you will be looking after the diaper witch and tending to her needs and hope you dont make her mad enough to dispose of you like a dirty diaper.

A diaper witch is a witch like any other while instead of a magic wand, uses diapers to cast spells by (you guessed it) using them as an adorable baby would. Each time the witch poops or peeing into a diaper she may cast a spell on someone or herself.

Some ideas of what may happen.
-Caretaker forgot to buy diapers so the witch turns the caretaker into a diaper to use for his/her nap.
-Caretaker tries to invite friends over for the witch to play with only for it to turn into a baby party where all the guests are turned into babies.
-witch is feeling hungry and looks for someone to feed him/her some succulent mother's milk.
-witch is feeling playful so he/she goes to explore the world for "new toys"
-Sexual content is allowed but it's not to be focused on super heavily.
-Feel free to add chapters to the story, best additions will be gifted Points! (400 to 700 points baised on Length and quality of entry)
